sentences.english: The past is a good place to visit, but certainly not a good place to stay.
sentences.chinese: 過去，是我們偶爾到訪的好去處，但顯然不宜長留。

sentences.english: And the NMD program is, in essence, an U.S. program of unilateral nuclear expansion, which harbors the inherent danger of triggering an arms race at a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 美國此舉顯然孕育着引發更高水平上軍備競賽的危險。

sentences.english: That apparently made quite an impression on the president's young daughter.
sentences.chinese: 着很顯然給總統的小女兒留下了很深的印象。

sentences.english: Obviously, two, now what do I do?
sentences.chinese: 很顯然，是2，那我該怎麼辦？

sentences.english: It was evident that her physical strength could not support her strenuous task.
sentences.chinese: 繁重的工作顯然使她有些力不勝任。

sentences.english: Clearly this was a profitable happenstance for both the owners and the king.
sentences.chinese: 顯然後者對於農場主和國王來說都是收益頗豐的驚喜。

sentences.english: It is simply impossible to play StarCraft perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 顯然要把星際玩到完美幾乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: Today’s scandal-a-month journalism has clearly gotten out of control.
sentences.chinese: 今天，“醜聞月月有”的新聞工作顯然已經失控。

sentences.english: Obviously, Cuiping was nervous and so her smile was not genuine.
sentences.chinese: 翠平顯然很緊張，笑聲一點兒也不好聽。

sentences.english: Two weeks later, it's clear that those fears were overblown.
sentences.chinese: 兩週之後來看，當時的這種擔心顯然言過其詞了。

sentences.english: where apparently future attorneys don't like talking to each other very much.
sentences.chinese: 而顯然，未來的律師們是不太喜歡彼此交談的。

sentences.english: An attack on him was obviously an attempt to destabilise his country.
sentences.chinese: 攻擊他顯然是企圖破壞他國家的穩定。
顯然穆加貝對此付之一笑。

sentences.english: Her face was browned. It was clear that was affected by strong ultraviolet rays .
sentences.chinese: 臉是棕色的，顯然是受了強烈紫外線照射的影響。

sentences.english: She had evidently been a handsome woman, and was well preserved still.
sentences.chinese: 她顯然曾是位漂亮的女人，而且保養得很好。

sentences.english: He clearly has a lot of respect for Borges.
sentences.chinese: 他顯然十分地尊重博爾赫斯。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
